benchmark_details.name: Uchaguzi-2022: A Dataset of Citizen Reports on the 2022 Kenyan Election
benchmark_details.overview: Uchaguzi-2022 is a dataset of 14,169 categorized and geotagged citizen reports related to the 2022 Kenyan General Election, focusing on election-related issues such as misconduct and violence.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset for modeling and understanding citizen reports on election issues to support AI for Social Good.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The topic labels are not specific to the context of Kenyan elections, which may limit their applicability in other regions.

data.source: Citizen reports collected via the Uchaguzi platform during the 2022 Kenyan General Election.

methodology.calculation: Performance metrics are calculated based on predictions compared to volunteer and expert annotations.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better model performance in categorization and geotagging tasks.
methodology.validation: Performance is benchmarked against volunteer and expert annotations.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The dataset contains only publicly available data and does not include personally identifiable information.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data is available for research purposes only upon agreement not to use it for malicious purposes.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: The data collection process follows the terms of service of the Uchaguzi platform.
